nobilva.title:
I won't let my grades
hold me back.
nobilva.subtitle:
Unlock your potential.
Our dedicated mentors provide personalized support
from weekly planning to execution, helping young athletes excel both on and off the field.
nobilva.description:
As recommendations and academic records become more important, more students are giving up on their dream schools because their "grades aren't good enough."
Nobilva supports young athletes who give their all to sports with a proven system that makes studying sustainable—a new kind of learning support designed for champions.

descriptionHighlight.text: proven system that makes studying sustainable

items.question: Who are the mentors?
items.answer: Our mentors are current students from elite universities like the University of Tokyo and Kyoto University. We know what you're thinking—'Can students really help my child?' That's why we prioritize not only academic excellence but also their experience balancing sports and academics, and their genuine commitment to supporting students. Because they've walked the same path, they truly understand your child's struggles and can provide empathetic, proven guidance.

items.question: What grade levels do you serve?
items.answer: We serve middle school students, high school students, and students preparing for university entrance exams. We carefully design personalized plans tailored to each student's target schools, current academic level, and athletic commitments. Whatever your child's situation, please feel free to reach out for a consultation.

items.question: How detailed is the study plan?
items.answer: We create highly detailed plans with weekly schedules and daily to-do lists. During our weekly check-ins, we review progress and flexibly adjust the plan as needed. Of course, we also factor in practice schedules and competitions to ensure the plan is realistic and achievable for your child.

items.question: Can everything be done online?
items.answer: Yes, all our support services are fully online. We use Zoom for consultations and a dedicated learning management app for progress tracking and Q&A. You can access our services anytime with an internet connection—even during away games or training camps. Rest assured, distance is never a barrier.

items.question: Can I receive one-on-one tutoring?
items.answer: Yes, absolutely. In addition to study planning support, we offer one-on-one tutoring as an optional add-on for subjects where your child needs extra help. We also offer tutoring-only plans. For detailed pricing information, please check our pricing page or feel free to contact us.

items.question: Are there material fees or enrollment fees?
items.answer: There are no enrollment fees whatsoever. For study materials, we recommend age-appropriate textbooks and workbooks available at retail stores, which you'll purchase separately. Your mentor will provide detailed guidance on which materials are best for your child's needs, so you can feel confident in your choices. For detailed pricing information, please see our pricing page.

items.question: What payment methods are available?
items.answer: We accept bank transfer or direct debit. We'll explain the payment schedule and billing cycle in detail during the contract process. If you have any questions or special requests, please don't hesitate to contact us.

items.question: How does the contract work?
items.answer: Each family contracts directly with Nobilva on an individual basis. We do not contract directly with teams. This structure allows us to provide flexible, personalized support tailored to each athlete's unique situation and goals. For families joining through a team, we apply team special pricing to each individual contract.

items.question: Is there any burden on the team administration?
items.answer: There are no costs for the team administration. All we ask is an invitation to your team's communication channels (such as LINE groups) so we can reach out to athletes and families. After onboarding, we handle all operations directly with each family, so there's no ongoing administrative work required from your team. You can introduce our services with complete peace of mind.

items.question: Tell me about team special pricing
items.answer: When joining through a team, we offer team special pricing at a discounted rate compared to individual enrollment. The specific discount rate and conditions vary based on team size and number of participants, which we'll explain in detail during the initial consultation. Please feel free to inquire.

items.question: Do you provide reports to parents?
items.answer: Yes, we provide regular reports to parents upon request. We'll share detailed updates on academic progress, study habits, and how well your child is balancing sports and academics. The frequency and content of reports can be customized to your family's preferences, so please let us know what works best for you.

items.question: Can you help athletes who miss school frequently due to tournaments?
items.answer: Yes, absolutely—in fact, these are exactly the athletes who benefit most from Nobilva's support. For athletes who miss school frequently due to tournaments and competitions, or who struggle to balance sports and academics, we create realistic, flexible plans and maintain close communication. Many of our athletes have successfully built strong study habits despite demanding schedules.

items.question: How long does it take to see results?
items.answer: Results vary by individual, so we can't provide a specific timeline. However, our first priority is helping each student establish sustainable study habits, then building toward academic improvement and goal achievement (such as admission to target schools or earning recommendations). Your mentor will support your child every step of the way—no rushing, just steady progress.

items.question: Do you offer free trials or consultations?
items.answer: Learning consultations are completely free. We'll discuss your child's current situation and goals, then recommend the best support approach. Free trial periods and promotional campaigns vary by season, so please reach out anytime. Even if you just have questions, we'd love to hear from you.

items.description: Motivation fades, and self-criticism creeps in.
items.solutionDescription: Weekly check-ins keep you on track, with mentors designing study plans together with you. You're not alone—we're here even on days when motivation is low. Keep moving forward with support that never quits.

Our Learning Management App & Daily Reports
items.solutionDescription: Daily to-do lists and progress tracking help you see exactly what you've accomplished. When results are visible, focus comes naturally. Even if self-discipline is a challenge, our system supports you.

items.problem: "Which textbook? What should I study next?"

items.solutionDescription: We analyze where you are and where you want to go, then provide the shortest path with the right materials. No more wasting time on endless choices.

items.solutionDescription: Completely online means no travel time to tutoring centers. Plus, we build flexible study plans around your practice schedule, competitions, and personal commitments. This is the advantage of Nobilva—designed specifically for student athletes.

items.title: No More Confusion—Just Clear, Actionable Steps
items.description: Your dedicated mentor reviews progress every week and creates a concrete action plan that fits your child's sports schedule. No more wondering 'what should I study?'—just clear direction and growing independence.

items.title: Daily Chat Support Makes Consistency Effortless
items.description: Just report what you studied each day, and your mentor tracks everything. With a clear daily to-do list, there's no confusion—just steady progress. Small daily wins add up to lasting study habits.

items.title: Build the Academic Profile That Opens Doors
items.description: We teach the hidden strategies for strong grades—assignment tracking, class participation, and the skills that impress admission officers. Your child won't miss opportunities because of preventable academic gaps.

items.title: Excel in Sports AND School—No Compromises
items.description: We adjust plans weekly around practice, games, and tournaments. Your child doesn't have to choose between their passion and their future—our system makes it possible to succeed at both.

teachit.title:
From thinking you understand
to truly understanding.
teachit.subtitle:
You can pass tests. But want to understand deeper?
Teach AI to find knowledge gaps and naturally develop explanation skills.
teachit.description:
Teach It helps you deepen understanding by teaching AI math concepts.
When you try to explain, knowledge gaps become visible. AI questions clarify ambiguities and naturally build explanation skills. Develop abilities that matter for exams, interviews, presentations, and your future career.

items.title: Discover Knowledge Gaps
items.description: When you teach AI, ambiguous understanding becomes clear. AI questions transform "I think I get it" into genuine comprehension.

items.title: Naturally Build Explanation Skills
items.description: Teaching develops your ability to communicate logically. Through repeated explanations, you'll express concepts clearly in your own words.

items.title: Stand Out in Exams
items.description: Effective for essay questions and written explanations. Beyond just solving problems, develop the ability to explain solutions—essential for competitive university entrance exams.

items.title: Skills for Life and Career
items.description: Excel in interviews, presentations, and personal statements where explanation matters. Build communication fundamentals you'll need in your professional life.

items.title: Light and Sustainable
items.description: Start with just 5 minutes per problem. Deepen understanding in spare moments. Not a heavy study app—designed to be easy and enjoyable to continue.

flow.title: How to Use
items: Choose a topic and teach AI

items.question: I can pass tests. Will this still help?
items.answer: Yes—in fact, you're our ideal user. Ever been asked to explain something and struggled despite knowing it? Teach It finds those knowledge gaps and builds explanation skills. Perfect for students ready to level up beyond average scores.

items.question: How does this help with exams?
items.answer: It directly improves essay and written explanation skills. Many competitive universities require not just solving problems but explaining them. For recommendation-based admissions, the ability to explain logically in interviews and personal statements becomes a significant advantage.

items.question: How much time does it take daily?
items.answer: Just 5 minutes per problem. Use it during commutes or short breaks. Small daily investments build understanding and explanation skills steadily.

items.question: What topics does it cover?
items.answer: Covers major high school math areas (Math I, II, III, A, B, C). Includes algebra, geometry, calculus, probability, and statistics. We're continuously expanding coverage.

items.question: Is it free?
items.answer: Yes, basic features are completely free. We also offer paid plans with advanced features and options for schools and tutoring centers. Try it free first.

mission.title: Mission
mission.caption: Our mission.
mission.description: Technology should make life better, not harder. That's why we started Nectere—to create technology that truly serves people. We design with empathy, making sure no one gets left behind.

vision.title: Vision
vision.caption: Our vision.
vision.statement: A future where technology and humanity work together, naturally.
vision.description: We imagine a world where technology feels natural, accessible, and genuinely helpful to everyone. Through our work in translation, web design, and print production, we're building bridges between technology and people—creating a future where everyone can thrive.

items.title: Human-Centered Design
items.description: People come first. Every decision we make starts with understanding how real people will use what we create—their needs, their frustrations, their goals.

items.title: Simplicity
items.description: Less is more. We cut through complexity to focus on what truly matters, making technology feel approachable instead of intimidating.

items.title: Empathy and Care
items.description: We listen, we understand, we care. Our designs reflect the diverse needs of real people, ensuring everyone feels included and valued.

items.title: Sustainability
items.description: Built to last. We create solutions that stand the test of time—technology that doesn't burn out users or become obsolete overnight.
